verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:14
verses.text: And the space in which we came from Kadesh–barnea, until we were come over the brook Zered, was thirty and eight years; until all the generation of the men of war were wasted out from among the host, as the Lord sware unto them.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:15
verses.text: For indeed the hand of the Lord was against them, to destroy them from among the host, until they were consumed.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:16
verses.text: So it came to pass, when all the men of war were consumed and dead from among the people,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:17
verses.text: That the Lord spake unto me, saying,
